description: To curb the spread of Coronavirus in the nation, The Govt. of India has permitted #vaccination for all above 18 years from 1st May 2021. In order to get...
cleaned_text: spread of Coronavirus in the nation, The Govt. of India has permitted [#vaccination](https://www.linkedin.com/signup/cold-join?session_redirect=https%3A%2F%2Fwww.linkedin.com%2Ffeed%2Fhashtag%2Fvaccination&trk=public_post-text) for all above 18 years from 1st May 2021. In order to get vaccinated, citizens need to pre-register themselves on Govt. approved portals and book their slots so that the vaccination drive can be carried out in a manageable manner without over-stressing the vaccination centres. So, be a responsible citizen and register yourself for the vaccination
